attributes.action: Stop Nicola Sturgeon triggering a second Scottish Independence Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
We are asking that this proposal is swiftly rejected. We are furious that the SNP have not listened to the population, have refused to accept defeat, and are willing to waste hundreds of millions more of our hard earned money while not doing much credible work in our country since the last referendum. 

Our country voted to REMAIN a part of the UK, and we still feel that the Union can prosper.
attributes.background: After spending hundreds of millions of taxpayers' money on a "Once in a generation" referendum (their words) and not getting the result that they wanted, Nicola Sturgeon and the SNP have refused to stick to their word, went against the majority of Scotland, and proposed plans for another referendum
